dcterms:description: MultiWOZ is a multi-domain task-oriented dialogue dataset spanning seven domains (i.e., Attraction, Hotel, Hospital, Police, Restaurant, Train, and Taxi). It contains about 10K dialogues. Each dialogue can span up to three domains, and multiple domains might be mentioned in a single turn. MultiWOZ provides action, entities and dialogue state annotations for each utterance.
dcterms:title: MultiWOZ

dcterms:creator: Raymond Li
Samira Ebrahimi Kahou
Hannes Schulz
Vincent Michalski
Laurent Charlin
Christopher Joseph Pal
dcterms:description: ReDial is a conversational recommendation dataset consisting of over 10K conversations, where users recommend movies to each other. The dataset includes annotations for movie mentions and whether the user likes it or not.
dcterms:title: ReDial

dcterms:creator: Meng Chen
Ruixue Liu
Lei Shen
Shaozu Yuan
Jingyan Zhou
Youzheng Wu
Xiaodong He
Bowen Zhou
dcterms:description: The JDDC Corpus is a large-scale multi-turn Chinese dialogue dataset for e-commerce customer service, containing over 1 million dialogues.
dcterms:title: JDDC

dcterms:creator: Weiwei Sun
Shuo Zhang
Krisztian Balog
Zhaochun Ren
Pengjie Ren
Zhumin Chen
Maarten de Rijke
dcterms:description: USS extends a subset of the above datasets with user satisfaction annotations, providing insights into user satisfaction on a 5-point scale for both exchanges and entire conversations.
dcterms:title: USS
